Comments_List: Communicating and writing about my research.

My writing skills improved SO MUCH. I'm also a more polished presenter! I also learned just how much work went into writing up research and I have 
 increased appreciation and respect for published articles.
They aligned well with my expectations.
I think that the course is a lean mean fighting machine that has been well honed to support Dr. Ashton's research students over the years.

Strength: It was very interactive and we would get frequent feedback which was helpful in the writing process.
Weakness: I think a bit too much time was invested in introductions early on. Would be great if that time was halved in the first semester and after we finish discussions in the second semester we get some time to rework our introductions to better fit our findings.
Stay very organized with your research and make sure that you meet deadlines!
If you did any kind of ecological research, I strongly advise you take this course! Be prepared to get and give feedback every week. This sounds like a lot but is super helpful in the long run.
